innerAbility.name: For Bossing
abilities: Damage to Abnormal Status +8% OR Attack +21

innerAbility.name: For Bossing (Alternative)
innerAbility.notes: Can be used if currently have high %Boss Damage

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+60}> <bg src={/class-icons/nova/kain/nova-warrior.png} tip={Nova Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/nova/exclusive-spell.png} tip={Exclusive Spell (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/nova/kain/incarnation.png} tip={Incarnation (Hyper Skill)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/nova/kain/assassin.png} tip={Assassin (1st Job)} val={+40}> <bg src={/class-icons/nova/kain/whispershot-mastery-1.png} tip={Whispershot Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+40}> <bg src={/class-icons/nova/kain/natural-born-instinct.png} tip={Natural Born Instinct (3rd Job)} val={+40}> <bg src={/class-icons/nova/kain/grinding-ii.png} tip={Grinding II (4th Job)} val={+35}> <bg src={/class-icons/nova/kain/whispershot-mastery-2.png} tip={Whispershot Expert (4th Job)} val={+30}>

linkSkill.name: Time to Prepare
linkSkill.shortDesc: By defeating 8 enemies or attacking a boss 5 times, you gain 1 stack of Time to Prepare. At 5 stacks of Time to Prepare, your damage increases by 25% for 20 sec.\nCooldown: 40 sec
details: Defeating 8 enemies or attacking a boss 5 times grants a stack of "Time to Prepare"
Upon gaining 5 stacks, gain a %Damage buff

build: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-swiftness.png} tip={Shadow Swiftness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/assassin.png} tip={Assassin}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/ghost-walk.png} tip={Ghost Walk}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/grappling-wire.png} tip={Grappling Wire}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/whispershot-booster.png} tip={Whispershot Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/whispershot-mastery-1.png} tip={Whispershot Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow-ii.png} tip={Strike Arrow II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/scattering-shot.png} tip={Scattering Shot}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/dragon-fang.png} tip={Dragon Fang}>

<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/grinding.png} tip={Grinding}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/natural-born-instinct.png} tip={Natural Born Instinct}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/lasting-grudge.png} tip={Lasting Grudge}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-phantom-blade.png} tip={[Execute] Phantom Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-tearing-knife.png} tip={[Execute] Tearing Knife}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shaft-break.png} tip={Shaft Break}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing}>

<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/advanced-deaths-blessing.png} tip={Advanced Death's Blessing}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/dogma.png} tip={Dogma}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/adapt-to-death.png} tip={Adapt to Death}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/grinding-ii.png} tip={Grinding II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/whispershot-mastery-2.png} tip={Whispershot Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-chain-sickle.png} tip={[Execute] Chain Sickle}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/nova-warrior.png} tip={Nova Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/dragon-scale.png} tip={Dragon Scale}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/falling-dust.png} tip={Falling Dust}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-poison-needle.png} tip={[Execute] Poison Needle}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/nova-temperance.png} tip={Nova Temperance}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/whispershot-guardbreak.png} tip={Whispershot - Guardbreak}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/whispershot-reinforce.png} tip={Whispershot - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/whispershot-boss-rush.png} tip={Whispershot - Boss Rush}> Whispershot - Guardbreak, Reinforce, and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-reinforce.png} tip={Execute - Reinforce}> Execute - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/lasting-grudge-reinforce.png} tip={Lasting Grudge - Reinforce}> Lasting Grudge - Reinforce_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow and Chasing Shot (1st Job / Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/dragon-fang.png} tip={Dragon Fang and Lasting Grudge (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing-node.png} tip={Death's Blessing and Unseen Sniper (3rd Job / Hyper Skill)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shaft-break.png} tip={Shaft Break (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/falling-dust.png} tip={Falling Dust (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/scattering-shot.png} tip={Scattering Shot (2nd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-chain-sickle.png} tip={Chain Sickle and Poison Needle (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-phantom-blade.png} tip={Phantom Blade and Tearing Knife (3rd Job)}> *
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
The last skill from the Tertiary Trio can be any skill as Kain only has 8 skills to boost
6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow and Chasing Shot (1st Job / Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/scattering-shot.png} tip={Scattering Shot (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/dragon-fang.png} tip={Dragon Fang and Lasting Grudge (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shaft-break.png} tip={Shaft Break (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-phantom-blade.png} tip={Phantom Blade and Tearing Knife (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing-node.png} tip={Death's Blessing and Unseen Sniper (3rd Job / Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/falling-dust.png} tip={Falling Dust (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-chain-sickle.png} tip={Chain Sickle and Poison Needle (4th Job)}>

credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Skill Passives + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Possess and Execute Skills & Dark Sight
content: In 2nd Job, you gain access to your special resource gauge, <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possession.png} tip={Possession (2nd Job)}> Possess that utilizes Malice. Malice is gained periodically and from attacking enemies with Whispershot skills like <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow (1st Job)}> Strike Arrow. Every 100 Malice, you gain a Malice Stone that is used to enter Possess state. In Possess state, enhances one attack granting it special effects. Possess skills share the same Skill Key and Skill Points (SP) as their regular version. Possess skills also have their own independent cooldowns from the regular skill
<bp_20 Malice is generated periodically in 2nd Job, it is increased to 30 in 4th Job_13 Malice is generated when landing a Whispershot skill, it is increased to 18 in 4th Job_>
Below is all skills that have a Possess form:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-strike-arrow.png} tip={[Possess] Strike Arrow (1st Job)}> Strike Arrow [1st Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/scattering-shot.png} tip={Scattering Shot (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-scattering-shot.png} tip={[Possess] Scattering Shot (2nd Job)}> Scattering Shot [2nd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shaft-break.png} tip={Shaft Break (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-shaft-break.png} tip={[Possess] Shaft Break (3rd Job)}> Shaft Break [3rd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/falling-dust.png} tip={Falling Dust (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-falling-dust.png} tip={[Possess] Falling Dust (4th Job)}> Falling Dust [4th Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/unseen-sniper.png} tip={Unseen Sniper (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-execute-unseen-sniper.png} tip={[Possess/Execute] Unseen Sniper (Hyper Skill)}> Unseen Sniper [Hyper Skill]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-dragon-burst.png} tip={[Possess] Dragon Burst (5th Job)}> Dragon Burst [5th Job] - Always usable_>

Additionally, in 3rd Job, you gain a passive called <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing (3rd Job)}> Death's Blessing. Possess skills add stacks of Death's Blessing which new Execute skills will detonate one stack for an additional attack. Detonating Death's Blessing also grants a %Final Damage buff to Death's Blessing and Execute skills

Upon defeating an enemy with an Execute skills or detonating a stack of Death's Blessing, the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step (1st Job)}> Shadow Step (1st Job) is reset
Below is all your Execute skills:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-phantom-blade.png} tip={[Execute] Phantom Blade (3rd Job)}> Phantom Blade [3rd Job] - Does not reset dash_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-tearing-knife.png} tip={[Execute] Tearing Knife (3rd Job)}> Tearing Knife [3rd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-chain-sickle.png} tip={[Execute] Chain Sickle (4th Job)}> Chain Sickle [4th Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-poison-needle.png} tip={[Execute] Poison Needle (4th Job)}> Poison Needle [4th Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-execute-unseen-sniper.png} tip={[Possess/Execute] Unseen Sniper (Hyper Skill)}> Unseen Sniper [Hyper Skill]_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/execute-fatal-blitz.png} tip={[Execute] Fatal Blitz (5th Job)}> Fatal Blitz [5th Job]_>
Lastly, several skills have a recharging cartridge system where you have a set amount of ammo which recharges over time. Below is a list of all cartridge system skills:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/scattering-shot.png} tip={Scattering Shot (2nd Job)}> Scattering Shot [2nd Job] - 3 Charges, 6 sec recharge_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shaft-break.png} tip={Shaft Break (3rd Job)}> Shaft Break [3rd Job] - 3 Charges, 8 sec recharge_<tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/falling-dust.png} tip={Falling Dust (4th Job)}> Falling Dust [4th Job] - 2 Charges, 10 sec recharge_>
<em text={Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord}>

In 1st Job, using <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step (1st Job)}> Shadow Step grants brief <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

primary.name: Facing the Past
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30. Move back to Toolen City.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/240/Reunion} title={"Reunion"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Strike Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 70%, Number of Attacks: 5\nArrow Fragment: Attack up to 2 enemies near your initial target 5 times, dealing 55% damage.
primary.desc: Fire several arrows forward
details: Upon successful attack, fragments are created that seek out enemies that were not hit by the arrows
Periodically enhances into <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow Enhanced (1st Job)}> Possess form, only in 1st Job

primary.name: Shadow Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 10 sec\n[Passive Effect]: Speed: +10
primary.desc: Dash in a given direction
details: [Passive]: Increases Movement Speed
Can be used to dash in all four directions using the Arrow Keys
Can be used while casting certain skills

When dashing you enter a <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state<bp_When using this skill on the ground, pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the dash immediately_>

primary.name: Grappling Wire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, shoot a wire onto a platform, then use the skill again to move along the wire\n[Passive Effect]: Jump: +10
primary.desc: On initial use, fire a grapple that can attach to terrain
details: After attaching, re-using the skill by holding down the Skill Key will move you towards the grapple<bp_Pressing the Skill Key again while moving along the wire will cancel the skill_>
Pressing the Skill Key and an Arrow Key together will direct the wire<bp_This results in either a straight shot or 45 degrees upwards/downwards depending on direction_>
Using the skill in the air causes you to hover briefly

primary.name: Shadow Swiftness
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost 10, Allows you to jump a greater distance.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>

primary.name: Assassin
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power +40, Critical Rate +35%, Knockback Resistance +50%, Max HP +15%, Defense +200, Damage Taken -15%

primary.name: Ghost Walk
primary.shortDesc: Avoidability +25%, Speed +20, Max Speed +20, Jump +10

primary.name: Possession
primary.shortDesc:
Create 13 Malice when Whispershot skills hit, with more Malice created periodically.
Gather 100 Malice to obtain a Malice Stone. You can carry up to 2 Malice Stones.
Upon using this skill, consume either 1 Malice Stone or 100 Malice to enter a Possessed state for 15 sec.
 Cooldown: 0.3 sec
primary.desc: A special resource called "Malice" that generates passively and whenever you attack an enemy
details: Each time 100 Malice is generated, gain a Malice Stone (max. 2 in 2nd Job)<bp_Consuming a Malice Stone will cause you to enter Possess state which causes your next attack to be in enhanced Possess form_>

primary.name: Dragon Fang
primary.shortDesc:
Summon Duration: 40 seconds.
Kain's direct skill attacks activate Dragon Fang, which moves towards the enemy and deals 110% damage 4 times. After activating, this skill casts Dragon Fang up to 7 times before returning. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +50%
Max Summon: 3
Attack Mode Cooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: When toggled, successful direct skill attacks summon Dragon Fangs that attack nearby enemies whenever you attack
details: Up to 3 can be active at a time
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Strike Arrow II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 160%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 5\n[Passive Effect: Strike Arrow Damage: +89% points, Arrow Fragment Damage: +85% points]
primary.desc: After using <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow (1st Job)}>, press the Skill Key again to fire another barrage of arrows forward
details: Shares a Key Slot with <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow (1st Job)}> and can only be used after it
Also creates Arrow Fragments
Additionally, permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow (1st Job)}> by a flat amount (including Arrow Fragments)

primary.name: [Possess] Strike Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 1 sec
details: Possess version of attacks are only usable in <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possession.png} tip={Possession (2nd Job)}> Possess state

Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow-ii.png} tip={Strike Arrow II (2nd Job)}> and the same Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Scattering Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 4, Arrows Shot: 5, each arrow can attack up to 2 enemies. Normal Enemy Damage: +30%\nEach subsequent arrow to hit the same enemy deals 50% less Final Damage.\n1 Scattering Shot cartridge is prepared every 6 seconds, and you can carry up to 3.
primary.desc: Fire a spread of arrows forward
details: Uses a special resource called "Scattering Shot Cartridge"<bp_Gain one cartridge every 6 secs (up to 3)_>
If an enemy is hit by more than one arrow, each additional arrow deals reduced %Final Damage
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: [Possess] Scattering Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 4, Arrows Shot: 6, Normal Enemy Damage: +30%\nEach subsequent arrow to hit the same enemy deals 50% less Final Damage.\nCooldown: 6 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/scattering-shot.png} tip={Scattering Shot (2nd Job)}>
Arrows will seek out enemies starting with the highest Max HP
Enemies hit repeatedly take reduced %Final Damage from the attack
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Whispershot Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Increases attack speed of Whispershot for 200 sec.
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Whispershot Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Whispershot Mastery: +50%\nAttack Power: +40

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase DEX 60

primary.name: Strike Arrow III
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 5\n[Passive Effect: Strike Arrow Damage: +79% points, Strike Arrow II Damage: +79% points, [Possess] Strike Arrow Damage: +120% points, Arrow Fragment Damage: +60% points]
primary.desc: After using <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow-ii.png} tip={Strike Arrow II (2nd Job)}>, fire another barrage arrows forward by pressing the Skill Key again
details: Shares a Key Slot with <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow (1st Job)}> and can only be used after <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow-ii.png} tip={Strike Arrow II (2nd Job)}>
Also creates Arrow Fragments

Additionally, permanently increases %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow.png} tip={Strike Arrow (1st Job)}> (including Arrow Fragments) <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/strike-arrow-ii.png} tip={Strike Arrow II (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/possess-strike-arrow.png} tip={[Possess] Strike Arrow (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Death's Blessing
primary.shortDesc: Max Duration: 90 seconds, Max Stack: 15\nBlessing Materialization: Consume Death's Blessing to attack 10 times with 135% damage and obtain merit buff.\nMerit buff: For 5 seconds, increase Final Damage of Death's Blessing/Execute skills by 10% and create 10 Malice when Execute skills that can materialize Blessing hit.
primary.desc: Possess attacks apply a stacking debuff onto enemies that "Execute" skills can consume to damage an enemy
details: [Debuff]: Execute skills consumes one stack of the debuff and damages the enemy<bp_Additionally grants a buff that increases by a flat amount the %Final Damage of Death's Blessing and Execute Skills briefly and generates Malice when Death's Blessing is triggered_>
When the debuff is consumed, the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step (1st Job)}> is reset
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shaft Break
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 67, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 184%, Number of Piercing Attacks: 3\nUpon collapsing, pulls 7 enemies and explodes. Explosion attacks 10 enemies 10 times, dealing 140% damage.\n1 Shaft Break cartridge is prepared every 8 seconds and you can carry up to 3.
primary.desc: Fire an arrow forward that pulls in enemies and explodes
details: Uses a special resource called "Shaft Break Cartridge"<bp_You gain one cartridge every 8 secs (up to 3)_>
Arrow starts pulling in enemies once it hits an enemy or reaches max distance
Explosion is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: [Possess] Shaft Break
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 67, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 216%, Number of Piercing Attacks: 3
Pulls in up to 7 enemies. The explosion attacks up to 10 enemies 10 times, dealing 270% damage.
The whirlwind attacks up to 10 enemies 3 times, dealing 55% damage continuously.
Cooldown: 11 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shaft-break.png} tip={Shaft Break (3rd Job)}>
Now additionally leaves a lingering cyclone briefly after exploding<bp_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: [Execute] Phantom Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 6
primary.desc: Slash forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing (3rd Job)}> debuff, the debuff is consumed

primary.name: [Execute] Tearing Knife
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 7\nCooldown: 4.5 sec.
primary.desc: Stab forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing (3rd Job)}> debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Tearing Knife, the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step (1st Job)}> is reset

primary.name: Lasting Grudge
primary.shortDesc: Upon using a Possess Skill or activating the death domain from Thanatos Descent, create crystals that remain for 10 seconds. The quantity created changes based on the skill used.\nEach crystal upon activation, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage: 130%, Damage Against Normal Monsters: +100%\nCooldown: 0.3 sec.
primary.desc: While toggled, when a Possess skill or <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/thanatos-descent.png} tip={Thanatos Descent (5th Job)}> hits an enemy, crystals are created that seek out and damage nearby enemies
details: Crystals activate whenever you attack near a crystal
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Natural Born Instinct
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +25%, Attack Power: +40, Critical Rate: +20%, Enemy DEF Ignore: +10%, Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Grinding
primary.shortDesc:
Max MP: +20%, Defense: +20%
Scattering Shot Damage: +75% points
[Possess] Scattering Shot Damage: +120% points
Dragon Fang Damage: +60% points

primary.name: Possession II
primary.shortDesc: Increases Malice created periodically by 30, increases Malice created when Whispershot skills hit by 18, and increases max Malice Stones you carry by 4.
details: Increases Malice gain rate
Can now carry up to 4 Malice Stones

primary.name: Advanced Death's Blessing
primary.shortDesc:
Upon defeating 50 enemies, recover 5% max HP.
Upon materializing Death's Blessing on a boss, recover 3% max HP.
Death's Blessing Damage: +163% points
Merit buff: Death's Blessing/Execute Skills Final Damage: +18% points, increases Malice created by 2 when Execute SKill that can materialize blessing hits.
details: Now restores %Max HP whenever you defeat a certain amount of enemies or when Death's Blessing activates on a boss
Increases %Damage of attack by a flat amount
Increases %Final Damage buff provided from Merit buff by a flat amount
While Merit buff is active, gain more Malice when Death's Blessing activates

primary.name: Falling Dust
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 451%, Number of Attacks: 8\n1 Falling Dust cartridge is prepared every 10 seconds and you can carry up to 2
primary.desc: Leap into the air and fire arrows down at an angle
details: Uses a special resource called "Falling Dust Cartridge"<bp_You gain one cartridge every 10 secs (up to 2)_>
When used in the air, you will not leap up

primary.name: [Possess] Falling Dust
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95. Shockwave Attack: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 515%, Number of Attacks: 10. Malice Follow-Up Attack: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 370%, Number of Attacks: 15\nCooldown: 14 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/falling-dust.png} tip={Falling Dust (4th Job)}>
Now creates a lingering dragon attack where the arrows landed
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: [Execute] Chain Sickle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95. Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 290%, Number of Attacks: 6. Finishing Blow: Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 315%, Number of Attacks: 12\nCooldown: 7 sec.
primary.desc: Swing a chain sickle forward and then slams it into the ground
details: If the attack hits an enemy with <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing (3rd Job)}> debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Chain Sickle, the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step (1st Job)}> is reset

primary.name: [Execute] Poison Needle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 105, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 8. Afterwards, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 272%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 8. Continuous attacks deal 290% damage for 12 seconds.\nCooldown: 15 sec.
primary.desc: Slash around before surrounding yourself in poisonous needles that apply a damaging debuff to enemies hit
details: When used in the air, you will float
Unaffected by Attack Speed increases
If the attack hits an enemy with <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing (3rd Job)}> debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Poison Needle, the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step (1st Job)}> is reset

primary.name: Dragon Scale
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 8% of Max MP per second. Hold the key down to maintain invincibility for up to 3.4 seconds\nCooldown: 40 seconds\n[Passive Effect: Bonus Avoidability: +30%]
primary.desc: When held, become invincible briefly
details: [Passive]: Grants an additional chance to dodge attacks
While active, you can move around
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Grandis Goddess appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Grinding II
primary.shortDesc:
Attack Power: +35
Strike Arrow, Strike Arrow II, Strike Arrow III, and Arrow Fragment Damage: +134% points
[Possess] Strike Arrow Damage: +220% points
Scattering Shot Damage: +102% points
[Possess] Scattering Shot Damage: +180% points
Dragon Fang Damage: +93% points
Shaft Break Arrow and Explosion Damage: +80% points
[Possess] Shaft Break Arrow and Explosion Damage: +205% points, Whirlwind Attack Damage: +30% points
[Execute] Phantom Blade Damage: +207% points
[Execute] Tearing Knife Damage: +238% points
Lasting Grudge Damage: +120% points

primary.name: Dogma
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +28%, Critical Damage: +20%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Whispershot Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Whispershot Mastery: +70%\nFinal Damage: +30%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +20%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Adapt to Death
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +25%, Boss Damage: +15%, Max HP: +20%\nDamage Taken: -15%, Knockback Resistance: +50%

hyperPassive.name: Whispershot - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of Whispershot skills

hyperPassive.name: Whispershot - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of Whispershot skills

hyperPassive.name: Whispershot - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of Whispershot skills

hyperPassive.name: Execute - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of Execute skills

hyperPassive.name: Execute - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of Execute skills

hyperPassive.name: Execute - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: If you use Execute Skill during Death's Blessing's Final Damage increase, no attack will push you back until the effect ends.

hyperPassive.name: Dragon Scale - Efficiency
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recover 7% of Max HP per second during key down

hyperActive.name: Chasing Shot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Chased: 8, Damage: 352%, Number of Attacks: 6, Number of Arrows Shot: 3, Damage Against Normal Monsters: +30%\nCooldown: 25 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Fire arrows that ricochet around one or more enemies
details: If there are no enemies, no arrows will appear
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

hyperActive.name: Unseen Sniper
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Max Key-down Duration: 1.4 seconds, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 193%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Shocks: 5\n1 Unseen Sniper cartridge is prepared every 40 seconds and you can carry up to 1.
hyperActive.desc: While held, charge to unleash a barrage of shockwaves forward
details: Holding the Skill Key will extend the range of the shockwave up to a max distance
While holding, gain 100% Knockback Resistance
Unaffected by Attack Speed increases

hyperActive.name: [Possess/Execute] Unseen Sniper
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Max Key-down Duration: 1.6, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 287%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Shockwaves: 5\nCooldown: 60 sec.
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/unseen-sniper.png} tip={Unseen Sniper (Hyper Skill)}>
If the attack hits an enemy with <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing (3rd Job)}> debuff, the debuff is consumed but is unaffected by the Merit Buff
If the enemy is defeated with Sneaky Sniper, the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step (1st Job)}> is reset

hyperActive.name: Incarnation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Duration: 35 seconds, Damage: +15%, Attack Power: +15%
Increases Death's Blessing effect of Death's Blessing-related attacks by 13.
When other party members within Kain's aura attack, the aura causes 6 Death's Blessing attacks, dealing 150% damage. Blessing of Death cooldown: 3 sec.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
details: While active, increases the number of hits per attack of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing (3rd Job)}>
While active, party members can trigger an additional attack while attacking near Kain<bp_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

fifthMain.name: [Possess] Dragon Burst
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Max Key-down Duration: 5 seconds, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 835%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 12, Max Attacks: 15. The effect ends immediately once all attacks have been made. Once the direction is changed, 0.5 sec. must pass before the skill can change direction again.\nDamage taken while the key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%\nCooldown: 60 sec.
fifthMain.desc: When held, fire a blast of arrows forward
details: You can change directions and move left and right while casting
You do not need to be in Possess state to use and will not consume Possess state to use
While held, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance), and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses

fifthMain.name: [Execute] Fatal Blitz
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Duration: 2 seconds, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 550%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 12, Max Attacks: 14. The effect ends immediately once all attacks have been made.\nDamage taken while attacking, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Release a barrage of slashes forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/deaths-blessing.png} tip={Death's Blessing (3rd Job)}> debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Fatal Blitz, the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/nova/kain/shadow-step.png} tip={Shadow Step (1st Job)}> is reset
While held, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance), and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses

fifthMain.name: Thanatos Descent
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 35 sec., Damage: +45%, 2 times of the damage increase effect applied to Death Domain
Malice created periodically increases by 40. Malice created when Whispershot skill hits increases by 35.
If your attack skill hits, Damage: 495%, Number of Attacks: 3, Number of Arrows of Death: 6, Damage Against Normal Monsters: +25%, Cooldown: 3 sec.
Using the skill again ends the effect immediately, while also activating Death Domain, which attacks 15 consecutive times, dealing 955% damage to up to 15 enemies. While casting Death Domain, you are invincible.
While Death Domain is active, the damage increase buff is maintained as much as Thanatos Descent's remaining duration.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases %Damage and increases Malice gain rate
details: Periodically, upon successful attacks, deal an additional attack<bp_Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters_>

At the end of the skill or when the Skill Key is pressed again to cast "Death Domain" attack<bp_While casting, you are invincible_If Death Domain is casted early, the %Damage buff will be maintained for the original duration of the buff_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Grip of Agony
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Passive Effect: Upon either defeating 20 enemies or attacking a boss 15 times, you can harvest up to 5 Death Throes.
Active Effect: MP Cost: 600, Required Death Throes: 1
Consumes all harvested Death Throes to summon Hand of Agony for 5 sec., attacking up to 12 enemies for 740% damage 8 consecutive times. Duration increases by 1 second for each additional Death Throe consumed.
Max Attacks: 27. The effect ends immediately once all attacks have been made.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Place down a damaging zone at your position
details: Uses a special resource called "Death Throes" that are gained from defeating enemies and attacking boss monsters and you can hold up to 5 Death Throes<bp_Using Grip of Agony consumes all Death Throes to increase the duration of the attack_>
Ignores Damage Reflect

fifthBoost.shortDesc: Strike Arrow and Chasing Shot Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Scattering Shot Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.shortDesc: Dragon Fang and Lasting Grudge Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Shaft Break Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Phantom Blade/Tearing Knife Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Phantom Blade and Tearing Knife Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Death's Blessing/Unseen Sniper Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Death's  Blessing and Unseen Sniper Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Falling Dust Boost

details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

Upon defeating 50 enemies, recover 5% max HP

skillCore.name: Total Annihilation
skillCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Unleash the power of the Black Nova. Shockwave Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 8, Number of Shockwaves: 26, Chase Cut Damage: 720%, Number of Attacks: 14, Chase Cuts: 12
Malice's Territory - Duration: 30 sec, Death's Blessing Damage Enhancement: 685%, if Incarnation is applied, Damage: 715%, Number of Attacks: 15
Death's Blessing Max Stack Limit: 20, periodically deals Death's Blessing to up to 10 enemies nearby.
When Death's Blessing activates, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 1150%, Number of Attacks: 15, Number of Devil Dragon's Breath: 2, Devil Dragon's Breath Cooldown: 0.2 sec
When Devil Dragon's Breath activates, Execute Skill Cooldown: -1 sec
Cooldown: 360 sec

skillCore.name: [Possess/Execute] Churning Malice
skillCore.shortDesc:
When Possess is used again within 30 sec. after casting, Execute can be activated
Possess - MP Cost: 500, Invinicible during casting
Releases your malice 15 times, dealing 3892% damage to up to 15   enemies 8 times
Enemies hit by your malice receive the Blessing of the End, which lasts for up to 90 sec. and stacks up to 30 times
Execute - MP Cost: 500, Invincible and ignore status effects during casting
Lashes out 17 times, dealing 4080% damage to up to 15 enemies 12 times
Blessing of the End - Max Damage: 4800%, Number of Attacks: 10
Ignore Defense: +60%, Boss Damage: +40%, Critical Rate: 100%

meta: Kain is a DEX archer class part of the Nova. Kain utilize Whispershots as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Kain can equip Weapon Belts
